attributes.action: Honour the result of the democratic EU Referendum held on 23 June 2016.
attributes.additional_details:
We are keen to move towards a UK which is free to trade with markets across the world, which maintains a high standard of welfare, environmental, equality and employment protections, and which welcomes controlled immigration from across Europe and the rest of the world. We look forward to being a true global economy.
This petition has been set up in response to the "EU Referendum rules triggering a 2nd EU Referendum" petition to give a voice to those who want to support the referendum result.
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, call upon HM Government to fulfill the mandate they now have to implement the UK's exit from the EU and move forward confidently to maintain the UK as a strong, liberal and welcoming country outside the EU but having strong trade & political  relations world-wide, incl. Europe.
